alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Monongalia; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 10:24AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MONROE... SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHWESTERN GREENE...NORTHWESTERN MONONGALIA...WETZEL AND MARSHALL COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 AM EST... At 1023 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pine Grove, or 9 miles northeast of Middlebourne, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... New Martinsville, Paden City, Cameron, Pine Grove, Hundred, Jacksonburg, Sardis, Aleppo, New Freeport, Wileyville, Proctor, and Big Run. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
